website_summaries.verdict: Terrific capacity and great control provides efficient frying for the whole family.
pros: 1500 watts power and 4.2 litre capacity offer excellent performance
Digital control and multiple pre-sets make it an easy-to-use and very versatile machine
Uses less fat than traditional frying
cons: Occasional faults suggest quality control could be better

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, expected it to have a removable basket, How they expect people to empty the fryer of a load of chips a couple at a time is beyond me and they are cold by the time you have got them out, ok for chops and sausages and frozen fish. I'm sorry I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: DFRUK

customer_reviews.title: An important step to a healthy diet!
customer_reviews.text: I can honestly say that i no longer need a deep oil fryer. This air fryer has replaced all my past needs, with food i can enjoy knowing that its more healthy now. I especially enjoy making my golden, crispy samosas in it. The timer and temperature system is a joy to use. It has a pleasant notification sound once food is ready. The safety system is great also in that it automatically stops if you open the fryer. In terms of cleaning, it couldn't get easier. I just place it in my dish washer every now and then. Highly recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: Abz

customer_reviews.title: Couldnt live without this gem
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous air fryer so quick that I very rarely use the oven, no more preheating the oven and it takes a lot less time than a convenial oven.I cannot recommend this fryer enough and I couldn’t imagine being without it, and saves a fortune on electricity so it’s probably paid for itself already, cooking wise it’s fabulous much better than a conventional oven and much crispier too, cleaning is an absolute breeze, I’d have to say I couldn’t live without this gem of a machine.
customer_reviews.author: mark f piper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for large family
customer_reviews.text: I love this air fryer. Easy to use. Food tastes great. I use it mainly for roast potatoes, wedges and chips - which are crisp on the outside and soft and fluffy inside. Perfect size for a large family. My only criticism is the finish of the design around the joints - could be sleeker. Having said that, it does look good. I do place it on a heat resistant surface as I read that it heats up, however it doesn't get too hot imo. Easy push control system with blue LED light. Highly recommended. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dzerzhinsky

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous!!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 1 and shortly after buying we were cooking a pizza but the steel retaining nut and washer from the fan came loose and ended up in the pizza. We got another one thinking that this must have been a one off but it happened again. Terrible dangerous product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Euan Crozier

customer_reviews.title: Great tool in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Since we got it we haven't used a pan to fry!! Kids have not noticed the difference of those potato crisps and the deep-fried ones. It creates healthier meals. You do not need to use much (or any) oil in these appliances to get your food crispy and browned! Quicker, More Efficient Cooking. It takes just minutes to preheat, and most of the heat stays inside the appliance. That makes the food ready super quickly !!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Gkiouz

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous - Don’t buy failed after 6 months see photo
customer_reviews.text: Metal Nut from inside appliance came loose and dropped into food, luckily my wife discovered this in her meal and not the in the children’s meals. Reported to Tefal customer service who don’t seem too bothered by this health and safety issue as I’ve had no reply!
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Good price well made
customer_reviews.text: Better than the old one, I have managed to burn a few bit as it cooks a lot quicker and better than our old one. Easy to use can get quite hot round back but not too bad, looks good NUS as big as I expected so dit’s on counter quite eell
customer_reviews.author: philm

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile and useful machine
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using it! Very versatile, easy to clean in the dishwasher. I like that it has an alarm feature, so you won't forget to trun the food. The basket is pretty big! Very fast cooking. The chicken bites were way better than store-bought!
customer_reviews.author: Ana M.

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this fryer for ease of use easy clean and good value
customer_reviews.text: This air fryer is easy to use easy to follow basic instructions i have cooked sausages chips spring rolls bread rolls fish cakes etc most things that you would normally cook in an oven or deep fryer can be cooked in half the time and no fat
customer_reviews.author: maryloo

customer_reviews.title: Very hot!  The base of this unit gets very hot.  It caused a crack in our worktop from the heat.
customer_reviews.text: We only used it once. The chips were very similar to those created by cooking them in a conventional oven, which was disappointing. But the major problem was the amount of heat generated at the bottom of the unit. We heard a loud noise and realised the heat had cracked our worktop. I have used Tefal deep fat fryers in the past. They are well insulated so the outside of the unit does not get too hot. So I would recommend avoiding this model.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B.

customer_reviews.title: Is ok - not excellent unfortunately.
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok - I previously had another type of airfryer by Tefal - that was much better. The one I have now has a continuous rattling sound and when you attempt to put the tray back into the airfryer, it does not slot in easily. I have sent it back to Tefal for a repair and after a couple weeks it has gone back to the same issue. Will be sending it back again. It is easy to clean though.
customer_reviews.author: mrs sonia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Like always, Tefal meid the difference. Very easy to use and the food is coming cooked to perfection, in no time!
customer_reviews.author: Roxana-Diana MAXIM

customer_reviews.title: Buyer be aware
customer_reviews.text: After having this product for 18 months and not used more than once a week there was a terrible rattling noise whilst cooking some chips. We opened to find the nut and retaining washer had come undone. In my opinion dangerous and not what you would expect from a manufacturer like tefal. Will not be purchasing another after seeing other reviews reporting the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: nigel south

customer_reviews.title: Healthy, quick and delicious
customer_reviews.text: This is my first air fryer and I am just loving it. The food is so light and yet retains its flavour. I don’t think I will be going back to having oil fried food too much. My kids love it too and they couldn’t tell the difference. The fryer is very easy to use and the recipe app is absolutely fab and easy to follow. The only downside I have noticed is that it is not that easy to clean especially if you put marinade chicken in, but still you get around it eventually. Will update my review if there is any change!
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I imagine to be!
customer_reviews.text: Well it is looking well but is not going for long time the ventilator it breaks after 2 weeks so if you are looking for something get a better quality and avoid this one
customer_reviews.author: Tiberiu Berki

customer_reviews.title: This is love!
customer_reviews.text: Almost a month ago I bought this air fryer and I am using almost every day, more than once. I love: - how easy to use - how quick I can make my (healthy)food - how easy to clean - the flavour of my food - not exactly the same than a deep fried but good enough for me and there is one more thing. I am on a diet plan but still I have a feeling when I am eating my food: “oh yes I am bing eating 😋” and this is satisfy my mind enough to not crave for “junk” food
customer_reviews.author: D.N.

customer_reviews.title: Broke  after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I have had this 4 months and it has broken completely . It sounds like a screw has come loose inside and it has stopped cooking . I have contacted amazon customer support they advised i need to send back for it to be repaired . When i have only had this long i do not find this acceptable .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Practice makes perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this air fryer. So far I'm happy with it. Cooked a couple of things in it and happy with results. Only one complaint.....Digital Panel on top of machine needs to be on the front. I'm not very tall so I have to pull machine forward so I can see on top. Also metal very thin. But apart from that great design and colour.
customer_reviews.author: ERIKA KOOTZ

customer_reviews.title: Love it - use almost daily for dinners etc.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say anything wrong about this air fryer . It’s best for making bacon and sausages. And the chips are tasty even though you only use small amount of oil . The best part is the cleaning - very easy just take the little tray out and wash it in the sink. Another thing i like about it is it doesn’t make your kitchen smell like a fry for weeks when you use this like it would normally if you make your fry on the pan . Overall it’s a very handy thing and I will definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: ZUZANA

customer_reviews.title: Tefal Easy Fry.
customer_reviews.text: I found that chips cooked in this, even shaken half way through the cooking period, were over cooked on one side and almost raw on the other. I followed the instructions to the letter and not satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: David F. Daykin

customer_reviews.title: Efficient device
customer_reviews.text: Air fryer works really well, sleek black design, cooks efficiently & in a timely manner, saving compared to using the oven. I did have a repair issue needed resolving, the item is covered by amazon so I sent it off & it was repaired & sent back to me really quick. (:
customer_reviews.author: Daiisy

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Be careful, I think it actually operates a temperature closer to that found on the surface of the sun. You'll need to shake often and reduce what temp you think you need to cook by around 20C. We love it, and I've cooked everything in it. A while to get used to but a very good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S. Mcgall

customer_reviews.title: Literally transformed our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is our second airfryer after our 4 years old actifry gave up. Airfryer has becomes the most important gadget in our kitchen, getting used once or twice every day. The ability to control then temperature on the newer models including the Easy Fry is fantastic as we can now use it for baking too. This model also seem to be quicker than our old one, perhaps due do the air circulation. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Terrible airfryer
customer_reviews.text: Had the airfryer 5 months and the fryer making a terrible noise. Amazon gave me a lable to send for repair its come back still the same with something rattling inside. I had my previous airfryer over 6 years no problems
customer_reviews.author: Terry B.

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Ive had this about 6 months now and still working perfectly. Had another previously which suddenly stopped working. This is bigger, easier to clean, use it everyday. Makes the nicest chips homemade or frozen. Just have to cook slightly longer to get that crispisness. But i use it for everything, chips, chicken, burgers, somosas, and baking treats. Think everyone should invest in one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Air Fryer
customer_reviews.text: So far so good since purchasing this. Very easy to use and clean, makes my food especially chips, nice and crispy. I regularly make quick meals, like sweet potato fries, fish cakes, fish, pasties etc. And there is no doubt it makes my life easier and more delicious. It's a bit loud, but saves you from using your oven. Price is not walletbusting and it's digital, so worth taking a chance.
customer_reviews.author: zhen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to cook
customer_reviews.text: Easy to cook crispy pork.I have more enjoy cooking now and so easy to cook👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: NP423

customer_reviews.title: good results
customer_reviews.text: So far used it with frozen French fries and the results are very good.one tea spoon of oil for full container. Some of the french fries that left can be reheated for 2-3 minutes . Used it with chicken slices came out dry.probebly need to add little oil.
customer_reviews.author: simon

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one month
customer_reviews.text: Worked for just over a month wonderfully, now has developed a very worrying rattle and switches itself off. Seemingly terrible build quality and absolutely disgusted that according to Amazon the warranty requires me to package and label my unit to send it to a repair centre. Usually taking 14 days but during Covid-19 this may take longer.....excuse me? I feel they should send a replacement and collect the old unit simultaneously. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kitchen gadget
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace our ageing Philips Air Fryer. It’s clear how much the technology has moved on. Much better performance, much quieter, and we espescially love the removable base plate in the cooking basket, making cleaning an absolute breeze! Would strongly recommend to anyone in the market for an Air Fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah P.

customer_reviews.title: we're within 12 months and the fan's fallen off
customer_reviews.text: Its not the easiest to clean, its been rattling for a month and now the fan's fallen off. Amazon have offered a return to them for fixing but have no idea how long it'll take. It also has what looks like vents on top but it actually vents all of the heat out of a small port at the back that you wouldn't notice, so its a great way to burn your walls and electrical sockets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty useless
customer_reviews.text: The Tefal air fryer was huge disappointment . It looks the part slick , easy to use etc BUT if it’s not frozen fries then I am sorry to say you are likely to be disappointed. We tried home cut fries I even bought a potato slicer , the fries came out unevenly cooked and pretty rough. We tried needed chicken and again pretty dreadful results . I would ask for my money back on this product !!
customer_reviews.author: Evangelia Grigorakou

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant and tasty
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little fryer - I'm not sure if it's a fryer or a fancy over/grill but either way it cooks food really well and with a juicy core and crispy outside. It's like a powerful small oven but it's great for marinated meat!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with my air fryer! Always get the biggest one you can afford - I think mine is a 4.8litre one and it’s perfect for the two of us, can cook a full basket of chips or a whole pack of salmon/chicken etc. Tefal is a good brand and it is so easy to clean, makes using it more frequently a no-brainer!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly for chips and other foods that’s been frozen or cooking in the kitchen I especially like the functionality it has for different foods it bakes them to perfection also it is good in size wise so it doesn’t take up to much room.
customer_reviews.author: Jevon

customer_reviews.title: Has become a regular part of our cooking
customer_reviews.text: We had our eye on an air fryer for a while and we have no regrets buying this one. Ever since we bought it, we have used it at least 3 times a week. It's dead easy to use and clean, and makes for much healthier food!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. Kersbergen

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen appliances
customer_reviews.text: it is great with digital function. Very precise. Xxl is big enough for a small whole chicken. Even make very good toast. Tefal is brand u can trust. Phillips are expensive, this is cheaper and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: HateTimeWaster

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant piece of equipment I would highly recommend this for anyone who is looking for one the easy fry that I have is the 4.2 litre and it's just big enough for me
customer_reviews.author: robert fowell

customer_reviews.title: Good cooking, capacity and value
customer_reviews.text: Good value, nice even cooking, 4 good portions. Be careful when moving or cleaning, some external parts at the back stay very hot.
customer_reviews.author: Laura V

customer_reviews.title: Amazing air fryer!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this air fryer!! Everything I cooked came out crispy and delicious!! I’ve had no issues at all with this item and really recommend it if your looking for an air fryer. It’s really easy to use and if you don’t want to use the pre set cooking time and temp for foods you don’t have too as you can change heat and time to fit what you need.
customer_reviews.author: denie

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy! Definitely will recommend to my friends. Very quick to cook. Crispy and very tasty chips and many different kind of food, such as fish and chicken. I really like display too. Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: oksana mandrikova

customer_reviews.title: Worth its price
customer_reviews.text: Chips come out unevenly cooked so you have to keep checking it and mixing it around , oil fryer is much quicker too (takes 20mins to do the chips with this air fryer) and you need to make sure you throughly clean before use (as instructed) , great for its price though and great size ! Also it doesn't stink up the house as there is little to no oil required.
customer_reviews.author: Rabeka

customer_reviews.title: Really simple and convenient
customer_reviews.text: A lot more convenient than most kitchen appliances for the most part. Really simple to use and east to clean up. Just make sure you don't tilt the basket while taking the food out, otherwise oil/grease goes everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: m ch

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I really like Tefal. I buy a lot for all membes in my family . Hope amazon sell this tefal as soon as possible. Because always out stock
customer_reviews.author: Phuong

customer_reviews.title: A very decent easy to use air fryer
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the price on sale £65. Not bad to clean as others have said. Should be good for a while.

customer_reviews.title: Cooking, baking, frying all in 1
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean and much quicker than oven, (I could have finished cooking something with this in time it takes the oven to warm up!) Only negative point is no cooking guide included so still experimenting with how long things need to be cooked for in this. Flavour of food is ever so slightly different but much healthier as no grease/oil.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I was initially a bit scared of all the flashing lights but it works brilliantly. I rarely use my oven or microwave these days.
customer_reviews.author: Rodt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to  use, very effective
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this product, had a tefal actifry before, will never go back as this is so much better, doesn't mash up the food and apart from remembering to shake food half way through or turn over it's very effective. I am still experimenting but have already cooked more variety than my old actifry.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without it now
customer_reviews.text: This air fryer is great! If you've never used one, you have to try, and experience perfectly evenly cooked fries every time. Also works well for chicken wings and thighs.
customer_reviews.author: oliver

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since sliced bread
customer_reviews.text: Best thing for my kitchen, easily stored away Handy when You want to grill chicken or frozen food
customer_reviews.author: Habiba Khatun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kitchen gadget
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this air fryer! Easy to use, does exactly what it says. Cooks food to perfection!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Terrible LED screen
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the LED screen is extremely difficult to make out so didn’t get to use it
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without it
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't possibly live without one now, we use it almost every day. It's so easy to use, and super good quality too. It cooks everything a normal oven does, but faster and easier! Great size too, can fit loads in, really no fault with this product
customer_reviews.author: Nathan James

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value So many uses
customer_reviews.text: Love it It will cook most things ,my oven has hardly been on since I’ve had this
customer_reviews.author: mrs picky shopper

customer_reviews.title: Grest buy
customer_reviews.text: Used for cooking chips and chicken drumsticks and they come out lovely and cooked quickly too. The mrs loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Daz

customer_reviews.title: Very tall for what it is, small inside
customer_reviews.text: Cooks well, just a shame you can't fit a chicken in it whole. Don't tip it after coming any fatty products as it will leak out the air holes.
customer_reviews.author: Mr J P Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: Why did I not buy this sooner. You can cook chips to a whole chicken in it. So easy if you don’t want to put the oven on
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Lesley McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't come with recipe booklet so useful to buy one.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product to use for lots of meals where you would normally use an oven.
customer_reviews.author: Katie gee

customer_reviews.title: Must have, if have space in kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Good for frozen products. Not pre heating required. Happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: varun negi

customer_reviews.title: Very small basket - Not suitable for family if 4.
customer_reviews.text: It cannot do most of the food. It's either too row or overcooked. The basket is very small and it's not suitable for family of 4.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: No doubts very worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Omg I'm so happy with my tefal. I even baked a cake, absolutely amazing. In love
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great air fryer, I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve definitely got the best air fryer, looks good, easy to work with and not too big. Food tasted amazing, so quickly and less oily. I love it, not regret I bought it, can’t fault it at all. Thank you Tefal!
customer_reviews.author: Desi

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money. Cooking capacity smaller than expected. Quite happy overall
customer_reviews.author: Mr & Mrs A.

customer_reviews.title: Essential for the busy family
customer_reviews.text: An essential product of a busy house hold. Great to use and very easy.
customer_reviews.author: andy goral

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Fast, Clean , No cooking Smell - love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my mother as she loved mine so much - these are a game changer
customer_reviews.author: morna

customer_reviews.title: makes cooking easy
customer_reviews.text: bought it on sale and I have been using it since I bought, which makes my cooking so much easier and saves my time. very easy to make pork ribs and chicken wings. no oil add, eat healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Just yesterday try it out. Chicken thighs was amazing. Fries was not so bad but not like usual probably because of way how they get cooked. Overall its really usefull
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this I think two months ago and I have not looked back since! Very good
customer_reviews.author: Shealynn

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cooks chips pizza and chicken a great time well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: rhys bailey

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase. Poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: Not a good purchase for the price. Ive had to refit the internal fan and replace screws on the handle. Clunky. Oversized and not particularly user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Mackum
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and very easy to clean. Food keeps its flavour. Its like everything you have to play around with the timings to get your cooking just right. We had been thinking about getting one for a while, get we now have one.
customer_reviews.author: Les Donkin

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase this year!
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of consideration, I decided to to go for the airfryer instead of another actifry. I have to say so far I am really impressed at how crispy and tasty the food is. It is so easy to clean and I actually find the cooking times are slightly better than the actifry.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommend
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs one of these. So easy to use, so easy to clean. Would 100% recommend getting one.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great value ans ideal size.
customer_reviews.text: Tried a few others but not right size or value. This is ideal for family of 4 and very pleased with quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This fryer cost nearly £135. Similar models cost two thirds of that price. Not good value for the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Mack

customer_reviews.title: Need a quality update
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use food cooked beautifully in it only thing needs upgrading is the quality of the outer material as it looks like it's not durable,cheap material and could put customer off bucause of it. Apart from that it works good. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Bhail

customer_reviews.title: Prompt service
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift but they were delighted with it.
customer_reviews.author: MR STEPHEN J DWYER

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It changes the way I cook, saving me time and effort to cook.
customer_reviews.author: Skye Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Gift for friend
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for a friend, they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at how easy it is to clean. Used it for red hot chicken wings and it was delicious! Also makes really good chicken nuggets and chips.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Chamorro

customer_reviews.title: Tefal EY401840 Air Fryer YUMMY
customer_reviews.text: Great another kitchen gadget for my wife.But it really works, great tasty food do come out,just hope she keeps cooking with it
customer_reviews.author: Man Hung

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy, good food ready in minutes, no mess, time saver,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No proper instructions, had to google.
customer_reviews.text: Used to do roast potatoes and home made chips, but all trial and error as to times and temperature.
customer_reviews.author: MRS S SIMPSON

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, simple to use, stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Only. Used once, but, gorgeous roast potatoes! I'm so excited to use it daily! Are there any accessories recommended for it?
customer_reviews.author: Heledd Sion

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: My first Acifry and I'm very impressed. Chips and roast potatoes are beautiful. Crispy on the outside and fluffy in the middle. Great size draw for cooking also.
customer_reviews.author: m barnett

customer_reviews.title: 😀
customer_reviews.text: This is really good but no operating book so still trying to work out what it can do
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: It doe's what it is known for.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was missing from our kitchen " Mrs words"
customer_reviews.author: Youneek

customer_reviews.title: its very easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product every day for most of my meats and potato products such as chips and roast potatoes, im very very happy with the product plus very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Carson

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use it's like your used a deep fryer
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant so far, Sui Mai turned out the best ever and healthy too , easy to use easy to clean and no oil needed
customer_reviews.author: LEE RILEY

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother buying this model
customer_reviews.text: Rubbish for cooking home-made chips - end up half cooked on one side, even with multiple shakes. Wish I’d kept to my previous tefal with turning arm
customer_reviews.author: Ms Margaret Findley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Just over a year old & turned it to hear a very loud fan noise! It does have a 2 year warranty though, so am hoping I can get it mended or replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good
customer_reviews.text: been making fired pork chop and chicken. So easy to use and once I played about with times and different breadcrumb coatings etc really happy with the result
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Gets very hot at back
customer_reviews.text: It takes 15 Minutes to heat up. Then it is quick the food tastes good and easy to clean
